column4: Ok, I think I'm retarded here... from /var I tried "cd www" and got the message "bash: cd: www: Permission denied" so, I tried "sudo !!" and got the message "sudo: cd: command not found" ... I know I missing something obvious here. Any hints?
cd is builtin => never works with sudo , use sudo -i or gksu nautilus
or add yourself to group www-data
How much time to set up dyndns?
i'm to lazy to set up dyndns.
I'll have to look into that. Is LightBox hard to set up?
Gallery2 or smth is what u need
I'll look into it. Thanks for the suggestion!
